name: Swapperoo
description: The friendly puzzle game intent on your defeat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.66 GHz or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor Graphics: OpenGL 1.3 or higher Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I recommend This game. All you gotta do is get a controller sit in a chair and chill and play a puzzle game that starts easy but gets hard. Its really fun! and really addicting.
i swapped a triangle for a square  10/10 would swap again
